headline: GE HealthCare launches CareIntellect for Perinatal, a cloud-first application to optimize care delivery and help send families home healthy
summary: CHICAGO, October 14, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced the launch of CareIntellect™ for Perinatal2, a cloud-first Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) application designed to deliver clear, actionable insights that help clinicians improve maternal and fetal care.3 CareIntellect for Perinatal supports clinicians by integrating information from disparate clinical sources in a single place, making it fast and easy for clinicians to monitor status, annotate clinical events, search historica

content.title: GE HealthCare launches CareIntellect for Perinatal, a cloud-first application to optimize care delivery and help send families home healthy
